content: this is a pdf pattern - digital download you will receive a download link via email due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final this pdf pattern is for those who wish to have an ad-free version with a full symbol chart of this square the written pattern portion is also available for free on my blog with a free video tutorial on my youtube 1 this pattern uses worsted weight yarn using a 5 00 mm us 8 / h crochet hook finished size of square is 5 5 inches using worsted yarn and suggested hook 7 page pdf pattern includes * written instruction * symbol chart b/w * symbol chart in colour way as shown 1 https //youtu be/tlvpccxyoam
